title: Hard to find Fonts
content:
I am busy with some art for my wedding. I can't find those fonts. Can anyone help me please? Thanks in advance.

Font 6

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307124421im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_6_6120.jpg)

Font 7

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307124421im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_7_3747.jpg)
author: stakkebo

comments.content:
Bottom one is Maiandra.  
This comes with Office.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307124421im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Maiandra-GD-(OpenType)_3823.gif)
Nope, sorry. Just look at the ‘G’, the ‘S’, the ‘e’ …

For the other one: That’s a machine font, maybe proprietary. Some similar fonts:  
 [Arame](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307124421/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dimitrelima/0arame/familytree.html)  
 [Autoscape](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307124421/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/AutoScape/Try+in+TypeWriter%E2%84%A2/)  
 [Carbon](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307124421/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/carbon/familytree.html)  
 [OCR-X](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307124421/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/ocrx/)  
 [Screener](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307124421/http:/www.canadatype.com/showfont.php?id=38)  
 [FF Ticket](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307124421/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=ticket)  
 [Thermo](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307124421/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Modular+Fonts/Thermo/)

Also: [Neubau Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307124421/http:/www.neubauladen.com/).  
F
